summary: Scotland Yard, officially New Scotland Yard, is the headquarters of the Metropolitan Police in London. The name comes from the original headquarters' entrance on Great Scotland Yard street. Over time, "Scotland Yard" became a nickname for the entire police force. They moved to a new building in 1890, adopting the name "New Scotland Yard." The headquarters moved again in 1967 and 2016 to bigger and more modern buildings, each time keeping the name New Scotland Yard.
title: Scotland Yard
